Interface ProjectStore

All Known Implementing Classes:
ProjectRepository
public interface ProjectStore
Persistence contract for projects

    Project

  • Method Details

    • findAll

      List<Project> findAll()
      Return all projects known to the store
      Returns:
      list of projects (may be empty)

    • findById

      Project findById(int projectId)
      Find a project by its identifier
      Parameters:
      projectId - project identifier
      Returns:
      project instance
      Throws:
      ModelOperationException - if not found

    • create

      Project create(String projectName)
      Create a new project with the provided name
      Parameters:
      projectName - name of the new project
      Returns:
      created project instance

    • save

      Project save(Project project)
      Persist changes to an existing project
      Parameters:
      project - project to save
      Returns:
      saved project instance

    • rename

      Project rename(int projectId, String newName)
      Rename an existing project
      Parameters:
      projectId - id of the project to rename
      newName - new name for the project
      Returns:
      renamed project instance

    • delete

      void delete(int projectId)
      Delete the project with the given id
      Parameters:
      projectId - id of the project to delete
